name: glsl-easings

scripts.test: npm run make:test && cd test/visual && beefy index.js -- -t glslify
scripts.make:page: npm run make:test && browserify -t glslify test/visual/index.js -o bundle.js

author: Hugh Kennedy <hughskennedy@gmail.com> (http://hughsk.io/)
description: Robert Penner's easing functions in GLSL, available as a module for glslify.
